result.name: Genome-wide analysis of short tandem repeats in the BXD
result.description: We leveraged genome-wide STR genotypes generated from whole genome sequencing (WGS) of the BXD family of recombinant inbred mice (Ashbrook et al. 2022) to determine the contribution of inherited genetic variation to the accumulation of new STR mutations across the genome arising during parent-to-offspring transmission.
